title: LootTracker
blurb: Gamers manage their game purchasing power through a dynamic Wish List utilizing a custom Chrome extension on Stream. Budget charts help gamers stretch their gaming dollars.
blurb2: Full Stack, React, Node.js, Express, MySQL, Sequelize, Chrome Extension, RESTful APIs, Material UI, JawsDB, Heroku deployment

title: FoodTrak
blurb: Users track calories and share through a dieting forum. Powered by Node.js, RESTful APIs and MySql with Bootstrap styling.
blurb2: Full Stack, jQuery, Node.js, Express, MySql, Sequelize ORM, Password hashing, Handlebars, RESTful APIs, Axios, Responsive Mobile-first CSS, MVC modularization, JawsDB, Heroku deployment

title: Expense Tracker
blurb: React based app for tracking expenses by category.
blurb2: React, Create React App, LocalStorage, Node.js, Express, Bootstrap, GitHub Pages

title: Living Life on Burgers
blurb: Full Stack Burger Monitoring Application with Heroku deployment using JAWSDB.
blurb2: Full Stack, Node.js, Express, Express Router, Handlebars, MySql, JawsDB, RESTful API, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, MVC modularization, Object-Relational Mapping, Heroku deployment

title: Shuffle
blurb: Astrological app uses API calls to aggregate zodiac content as users flip tarot-like cards
blurb2: JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Third-party APIs, Ajax, Agile Development, Git branching workflow, OOP, MVP

title: Weather Dashboard
blurb: Displays current weather at city of choice, plus a five-day forecast. Previous cities are stored.
blurb2: Javascript, jQuery, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Responsive Design, Third-party API via Ajax, LocalStorage

title: Password Generator
blurb: Browser-based random password generator uses selected criteria. Dynamically updates HTML and CSS with JavaScript.
blurb2: Browser-Based, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Responsive Design
